articles.title: Ukraine war: Russia to keep key gas pipeline to EU closed
articles.description: Russia says it has found a leak on Nord Stream 1, but the EU accuses Moscow of using gas as a weapon.
articles.content:
By Robert Plummer & Oliver SlowBBC News
Russia's main gas pipeline to Europe will not reopen as planned on Saturday, adding to concerns about energy supplies this winter.

articles.description: Americans sound off on whether they support paying for NASA's Artemis mission objective of landing astronauts on the lunar surface for the first time in decades.
articles.content:

articles.title: Northern California wildfire burns homes, causes injuries
articles.description: WEED, Calif. >> A fast-moving wildfire in rural Northern California injured several people Friday, destroyed multiple homes and forced thousands of residents to flee, jamming roadways at the start of a sweltering Labor Day weekend.
